1348470.name: Onigiri Premium Support Pack
1348470.description:
A deluxe support item pack for your Onigiri adventure! Get useful items at a discount and a limited accessory!

Contents
- Onigiri Coins: 500OC
- Soul Egg x50
- Gold Kompeitou x50
- EXP Boost +300% (60Min.) x3
- Ryou Boost +300% (60Min.) x3
- Drop Boost +300% (60Min.) x3
- Smelting Amulet Transcendent Fortune x3
- Oranmentation Amulet Transcendent Fortune x3
- Gacha Ticket x10
- Character Exchange Ticket -Premium Support Pack- x1
- Accessory Jounin's Wrap Hiei x1

Only one pack may be purchased per account.
Onigiri Coins are required to obtain certain in-game contents.

Using the Vanguard Basket -Premium Support Pack- will grant a Summoner's Scroll for one of the following characters of your choice:

Miyamoto Musashi
Dark Miyamoto Musashi
Sarutobi Sasuke
Himiko
Izuna Tri-Tail
Sakata Kintoki
Shuten-Douji
Oda Nobunaga
Lancelot
Uesugi Kenshin
Takeda Shingen
Gawain
Toyotomi Hideyoshi
Shibata Katsuie
Koujirou (Flying Swallow)
Ono no Komachi
Tristan
Sanzou
Android Six
Android Ninety-Nine
1348470.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 繁体中文
